attributes.action: Reduce tuition fees for university students this year.
attributes.additional_details: Tuition fees should be reduced this year as most students across the UK are limited to online learning only. Although university staff are working hard to provide a strong level of education, the lack of resources available and online-only teaching is seen by many as sub-par compared to previous years. This makes it difficult to justify the same £9,250 fee to myself and many other students. If we are learning in such an abnormal way why are we still expected to pay the normal fee?
attributes.background: The government should reduce tuition fees from the standard £9,250 for this year's university students.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
